text: Pankaj Rajesh Bhoyar is a member of the 13th Maharashtra Legislative Assembly. He represents the Wardha Assembly Constituency. He belongs to the Bharatiya Janata Party Bhoyar's election victory has resulted in BJP winning two seats in Wardha district for the first time ever. In 2014, Bhoyar has been a newcomer to the BJP, and is considered as being from the Datta Meghe group. Bhoyar has been president of Wardha district Indian Youth Congress. ==References== Category:Members of the Maharashtra Legislative Assembly Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2014–2019 Category:People from Wardha Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Maharashtra politicians Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Maharashtra Category:Maharashtra MLAs 2019–
title: Pankaj Rajesh Bhoyar
